CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( opportunity__r.Competitive_Material__c , "Plastic"), "Plastic; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( opportunity__r.Competitive_Material__c , "Glastic"), "Glastic; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( opportunity__r.Competitive_Material__c , "Metal"), "Metal; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( opportunity__r.Competitive_Material__c , "Ceramic"), "Ceramic;", NULL)
CustomField.label: Current Competitive Material
